recipes.name: Sicilian Caponata
recipes.instructions:
1.Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2.Add diced eggplants, sauté 10 min until golden.
3.Stir in celery, capers, olives and cook 5 min.
4.Add tomato passata, vinegar, sugar; simmer 20 min.
5.Season, let cool; serve with fresh basil.
